channel.title: Thought i fixed htis exception
channel.description:
ok i thoguht i fixed this exception but i was wrong, any1 that can hlep. plz do
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.SpecDamg(client.java:1966) at client.process(client.java:16504) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) at server.main(server.java:71)[/code]

item.title: Thought i fixed htis exception
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

catch (NullPointerException npe)

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/NullPointerException.html

A hint. ‘I’m feeling lucky’ almost any java term, and it will take you right to the API.
